text: Ani phira'aunacya janasamuhace saradara mhanale, kaya tumhi musa ani tyacya lokanna aseca soduna dyala ki tyanni dharativara phasada (utpata) karava, ani tumaca va tumacya daivatanca tyaga karava. To mhanala, amhi tyacya putranna thara maru ani tyancya striyanna jivanta thevu ani amhi tyancyavara varcasvasali ahota
